welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Opmeer, a charming Dutch city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at De Kooy/Den Helder Airport, serving all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at De Kooy/Den Helder Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Schiphol's largest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving mainly European and some intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Dedicated to long-haul flights, including to North America and Asia.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a time limit of 4 hours per session.
